item.title: Head Database

item.content:encoded:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/head-database.14280/

We use this plugin to give players easy access to a huge repository of heads that can be used any time for free

Â â€ƒÂ Â â€ƒÂ 

Already have a Premium Heads plugin?
Contact me on Discord to get upgraded!

Head DatabaseÂ is a fast and user-friendly plugin that allows you to obtain thousands of custom Minecraft skulls that feature unique designs.
This easy-to-use heads plugin gives you access to creative designing opportunities that overall enhance the quality of your builds, and gives creative freedom to yourself and your players.

If you want to find more ways for your builds to shine, effortlessly, this plugin is for you!â€‹

  • Over 25,000 custom headsÂ to choose from.
  • Regular updatesÂ provided by theÂ minecraft-heads.comÂ website.
  • Organized GUIÂ with multiple categories and pages.
  • Create customizable categoriesÂ in which you can add your own heads.
  • Vault,Â Items, andÂ PlayerPointsÂ currency support.
  • Advanced search functionÂ to browse for heads.
  • Gain access toÂ heads that are exclusive to this database only.
  • Suggest headsÂ for future database updates.
  • HeavilyÂ customizable GUIÂ menu.
  • Asynchronous loading optionÂ to lessen lag.
  • Customizable featured tag groups.
  • Functional and accessibleÂ API system.

â€‹

Â 
â€‹

Permission:Â headdb.open

â†“â€‹
Commands:

/headdbÂ orÂ /hdbÂ orÂ /heads:Â Opens the user interface.
/hdb info | i:Â Shows information about the plugin and database.
/hdb search | s [input]:Â Search for heads in the database.

â€‹

Permission:Â headdb.phead

â†“â€‹
Commands:

/playerhead [name]Â orÂ /phead [name]Â orÂ /playerh [name]:Â Gives you a player’s head.

â€‹

Permission:Â headdb.admin

â†“â€‹
Commands:

/hdb reload | r:Â Reloads the entire plugin.
/hdb random <player> <category>:Â Gives a random head from the database to a player.
/hdb open [player] <category/search>:Â Opens the database for a specified player (requires renamed category name).
/hdb give | g [ID] <amount> <player>:Â Gives a specified player a specified amount of heads.
/hdb base64:Â Gives you the base64 code for the head that you are holding.
â€‹

Permissions:

headdb.allow.buy.[categoryName]:Â Allows the player to buy heads from a specified category.
headdb.allow.buy.*:Â Allows the player to buy all heads.
headdb.category.[categoryName]:Â Allows the player to see heads from a specified category.
headdb.category.*:Â Allows the player to see heads from a specified category.
headdb.free.[categoryName]:Â Makes a specified category free for the player.
headdb.free.*:Â Makes all categories free for the player.
headdb.online.hide:Â Hides the player from the online players category.
headdb.admin.showid:Â Allows the player to see the ID’s of heads.
headdb.admin.disabled:Â Allows the player to see disabled categories.
headdb.admin.nocooldown:Â Removes the cooldown on getting heads if enabled for the player.
â€‹

Categories:Â (category names can be changed in the config)

alphabet,Â animals,Â blocks,Â decoration,Â food_drinks,Â humans,Â humanoid,Â miscellaneous,Â monsters,Â plants,Â online_players,Â custom,Â custom2,Â custom3,Â custom4,Â custom5â€‹

 

/hdb info | i: Displays the creators of the plugins and the total amount of loaded heads. This includes locally saved heads in your custom section.

/hdb search | s: If you use this command without any input, you will be able to search for a head by simply writing the name of it in the chat. You don’t need to specify the exact name of the idea.

/hdb give | g [ID] <amount> <player>: For this command, you need to input the ID of the head. To get the ID of the head, you need to either be opped or have the permissionÂ headdb.admin.showid
Example:Â /hdb give 4982 10 PeterÂ will give Peter 10 “Apple” heads.

â€‹

Code (YAML):
#You can change your language here.
#Supported languages can be found in the texts folder.
locale:Â "en_US"

# put a cooldown on getting heads
cooldown-heads:Â false
cooldown-time:Â 3

# automatically remove invalid custom heads (HD heads) from inventories
# recommended for creative servers!
remove-invalid-heads:Â false

# toggle for keeping the category on heads.
keep-category:Â false

# toggle for showing heads in search which you do not have permission to buy
show-no-permission-search:Â false

#Disable some heads here
#They only will be removed on a database update or a server restart/reload
disabled-heads:
# Â - "Chorus Plant"
# Â - "ID:7302"
# Â - "TAG:Animals"

#Disable categories here
#They only will be removed on a database update or a server restart/reload
disabled-categories:
Â -Â ""
Â  -Â "online_players"
Â  -Â "custom2"
Â  -Â "custom3"
Â  -Â "custom4"
Â  -Â "custom5"
# Â - "custom"

# change the names of the heads here
# Â ID: "name here"
rename-heads:
Â  12105:Â "Iron Armour Herobrine"
# Â 3229: "&oBarrier Block"

# Toggle for showing the info and suggestions buttons in the main inventory
info-enabled:Â true
suggest-enabled:Â true
search-enabled:Â true
command-enabled:Â false
featured-tags-enabled:Â true
main-menu-category-slots:Â "10,11,12,13,14,15,16,19,20,21,22,23,24,25,28,29,30,31,32,33,34"
main-menu-info-slot:Â 41
main-menu-suggest-slot:Â 42
main-menu-search-slot:Â 43
main-menu-command-slot:Â 49

# Custom command to executed when clicking the command item (can be used as a back button to another menu)
custom-command:Â "menu"

# Featured tags
main-menu-featured-tags-slots:Â "37,38,39,40,41,42,43"
# [title]:[id,id...]:[search]:[startMonth-startDay]:[endMonth-endDay]
# title can contain a lang formatted message.
featured-tags:
Â -Â "event.halloween:13779,12750,13584,12581:Halloween:10-20:11-7"
Â  -Â "event.christmas:1594,3158,2910:Christmas:11-24:12-31"
Â  -Â "event.newYear:4446,4447,4448:Firework:1-1:1-7"
Â  -Â "event.valentines:14696,14691,14672,14687,14673:Valentine:2-1:2-21"
Â  -Â "event.4thOfJuly:890:Firework:7-3:7-5"
Â  -Â "event.easter:726:Easter:3-31:4-30"

# seasons
Â  -Â "event.winter:3295,1697:Winter:10-25:12-31"
Â  -Â "event.winter:3295,1697:Winter:1-1:3-31"
Â 
Â  -Â "event.summer:573:summer:6-15:9-30"
Â 
# fun special days
Â  -Â "event.MayThe4th:14018,11622,8108,14028:Star wars:5-1:5-8"
Â  -Â "event.piDay:13603,45,57,46:Pie:3-13:3-15"
Â  -Â "event.pokemon:13797,8642,1644,2457:Pokemon:2-26:2-28"
Â  -Â "event.StPatricksDay:14225,3034:St Patrick's Day:3-16:3-18"
Â  -Â "event.dayOfTheDead:23693,23724,23725:Day of the Dead:11-1:11-3"
Â  -Â "event.pirate:4053,11331,2711:Pirate:9-18:9-20"
Â  -Â "event.taco:28,20769:Taco:10-3:10-5"
Â  -Â "event.mario:7287,23510,20124:Mario:3-9:3-11"

# all year round
Â  -Â "messages.recentHeads:11504:recent:1-1:12-31"

# Toggle for using a arrow (only back and next) instead of the paper web based one
# Also moves the back to main menu to the middle and removes the compass
arrow-menu-nav-enabled:Â false
arrow-menu-search-enabled:Â true
arrow-menu-current-page-enabled:Â true
#slots (only works with arrow menu navigation)
back-to-menu-slot:Â 45
arrow-back-slot:Â 47
current-page-slot:Â 49
arrow-next-slot:Â 51
arrow-search-slot:Â 53
#switch search and back to main menu places
# false: left = back & right = search
#(only works with page menu navigation)
page-menu-switch-slots:Â false

#items (also work on the other paper navigation system)
#all the items have to be different from eachother
#
#use the 1.12 and below Material syntax (1.13 materials are not yet supported)
arrow-item:Â "arrow"
paper-page-item:Â "paper"
current-page-item:Â "empty_map"
back-to-menu-item:Â "book"
info-item:Â "sign"
suggest-item:Â "writeable_book"
search-item:Â "compass"
command-item:Â "barrier"
background-item:Â "stained_glass_pane:8"
background-border-item:Â "stained_glass_pane:7"
loading-head-item:Â "skull_item:3"

# Toggle for chat search, if false it will ask you to do the command instead.
use-chat-search:Â false

# Close inventory when you don't have enough money to buy a head
close-inventory-on-failed-purchase:Â false

# Close inventory when you buy a head
close-inventory-on-successful-purchase:Â false

# Toggle for returning lore and name to the item when picked up
return-name-on-pickup:Â true

# Experimental async head loading
# Can be disabled in 1.13 as heads no longer lag out clients
experimental-loading:Â true
loadHeadAmount:Â 9
loadTimeDelay:Â 10.0

#Enable Economy here
#If the price is 0 it won't show up!
Economy-Enabled:Â false
Economy-Currency:Â "$"
#Type can be "item", "currency" or "playerpoints"
Economy-Type:Â currency
Economy-Item:Â gold_ingot
#if ItemName equals "" then it ignores the name of the item
Economy-ItemName:Â ""
#if ItemLore equals "" then it ignores the lore
#else ItemLore only checks the first line of the lore
Economy-ItemLore:Â ""

alphabet-price:Â 100
animals-price:Â 100
blocks-price:Â 200
decoration-price:Â 100
food_drinks-price:Â 100
humans-price:Â 100
humanoid-price:Â 100
miscellaneous-price:Â 100
monsters-price:Â 100
plants-price:Â 100
custom-price:Â 1000
custom2-price:Â 1000
custom3-price:Â 1000
custom4-price:Â 1000
custom5-price:Â 1000
online_players-price:Â 100
phead-price:Â 100

# you can set the category ID's here

alphabet-id:Â 164
animals-id:Â 335
blocks-id:Â 106
decoration-id:Â 4151
food_drinks-id:Â 22
humans-id:Â 3996
humanoid-id:Â 1530
miscellaneous-id:Â 537
monsters-id:Â 4187
plants-id:Â 11461
custom-id:Â 242
custom2-id:Â 242
custom3-id:Â 242
custom4-id:Â 242
custom5-id:Â 242
online_players-id:Â 2669

# Send custom heads to public database
# Heads added to your own custom categories might get added to the database.
send-heads-to-database:Â true
author-name:Â "HDB-default"

# format= name: "base64"
# do not use any ,'s in your name !
# you can use uuid:[player-uuid] to use normal players their skins
# tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=upc4gOAQN5Y

# NOTE: If you see duplicated textures restart your client to refresh your cache
custom:
Â  Head Database:Â "eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvYTZjYzQ4NmMyYmUxY2I5ZGZjYjJlNTNkZDlhM2U5YTg4M2JmYWRiMjdjYjk1NmYxODk2ZDYwMmI0MDY3In19fQ=="
Â  Made by:Â "eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvNzg3Njg5ZjgzMzQzNmFhNzExYWJiZDQ1MTY4ODU2Nzc1YTJiMTE0NjU2Y2RmNGRjNWE2YzZmMWFmYWU1MjAifX19"
Â  Arcaniax:Â "uuid:4d3c1f2f71264d9b93ec01208a57188c"
Â  -:Â "eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvZWQ3YWJjNDM2ODI5MzA3MGRjYjE2ZTRmN2ZlMGMyMWM3MzE3MTIxOTllYjI3MmYyZmRiN2E2ZmU2OTZjYmYzIn19fQ=="
Â  Hosted by:Â "eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvZDVjNmRjMmJiZjUxYzM2Y2ZjNzcxNDU4NWE2YTU2ODNlZjJiMTRkNDdkOGZmNzE0NjU0YTg5M2Y1ZGE2MjIifX19"
Â  LordRazen:Â "uuid:8d0a41175a764b72a7dc67b555119fef"
custom2:
Â  Â§eplayerÂ§6's head;100:Â "personal_head"
Â  Steve's skull;100:Â "vanilla:steve"
Â  Skeleton skull;200:Â "vanilla:skeleton"
Â  Wither skeleton skull;3000:Â "vanilla:wither_skeleton"

custom3:

Code (YAML):

# en_US.lang

! &bUsing default &3"en_US.lang"Â &bcreated by &6Arcaniax

# Change the messages here, you can use & to use colors.
# buyMessage must contain %Item% and %price%
# database can contain %count%

messages.prefix:Â &6HeadDB>Â &r
messages.database:Â &4HeadÂ DB&8Â %count% heads
messages.search:Â &4HeadÂ Search&8Â %count% heads
messages.page:Â Page
messages.price:Â &aPrice:Â &2
messages.heads:Â heads
messages.head:Â head
messages.other:Â other
messages.loading:Â &c..Loading..
messages.recentHeads:Â &aRecentlyÂ added
messages.noPermissionToBuyLore:Â &cNoÂ Permission
messages.searchCommand:Â &7/hdbÂ searchÂ [input]
messages.pheadCommand:Â /pheadÂ [name]
messages.loreColor:Â &8
messages.headItemColor:Â &9
messages.categoryColor:Â &c&l
messages.categoryLoreColor:Â &e

messages.suggest:Â &bYouÂ can suggest heads here:
messages.submit:Â &bYouÂ can submit heads here:
messages.noPermission:Â &cYouÂ are not allowed to do that!
messages.notEnoughMoney:Â &cYouÂ don't have enough money to do this!
messages.notEnoughSpace:Â &cYouÂ don't have enough space in your inventory!
messages.buyMessage:Â &aYouÂ boughtÂ %item% &afor &2%price%
messages.backToMenu:Â &cBackÂ to menu
messages.clickToSearch:Â &a&n&lClickÂ here&b to search for heads
messages.noHeadsFound:Â &eNoÂ heads found, try again!
messages.moreSpecific:Â &ePleaseÂ be more specific!
messages.headsFound:Â &eHeadsÂ found!
messages.searchForHeads:Â &cSearchÂ for heads
messages.pluginInfo:Â &cPluginÂ info
messages.pluginSuggest:Â &cYouÂ can suggest heads here
messages.pluginSuggestLore:Â &7PleaseÂ check the database first!
messages.chatSearch:Â &bTypeÂ in your search input
messages.databaseStillLoading:Â &cDatabaseÂ is still loading, try again in a second!
messages.customCommandItemName:Â &cBackÂ to main menu
messages.patience:Â &cPleaseÂ wait a moment before getting another head!

# CATEGORY NAMES

category.alphabet:Â Alphabet
category.animals:Â Animals
category.blocks:Â Blocks
category.decoration:Â Decoration
category.food_drinks:Â Food and Drinks
category.humans:Â Humans
category.humanoid:Â Humanoid
category.miscellaneous:Â Miscellaneous
category.monsters:Â Monsters
category.plants:Â Plants
category.custom:Â Custom Server Heads
category.custom2:Â Custom Server Heads 2
category.custom3:Â Custom Server Heads 3
category.custom4:Â Custom Server Heads 4
category.custom5:Â Custom Server Heads 5
category.online_players:Â Online Players
category.disabled:Â Disabled

# EVENT NAMES

event.halloween:Â &eHalloween
event.christmas:Â &bChristmas
event.newYear:Â &6HappyÂ new year
event.valentines:Â &cValentine'sÂ Day
event.4thOfJuly:Â &cHappyÂ 4th of July
event.easter:Â &fEaster
event.winter:Â &fWinter
event.summer:Â &6Summer
event.MayThe4th:Â &3MayÂ the 4th be with you
event.piDay:Â &3PiÂ day
event.pokemon:Â &6PokÃ©monÂ Day
event.pirate:Â &cTalkÂ Like a Pirate Day

Â â€‹

Use with Maven:

Code (Java):
<!-- HeadDatabase-API -->
<repository>
Â  Â <id>headdatabase-api</id>
Â  Â <url>https://mvn.intellectualsites.com/content/repositories/thirdparty/</url>
</repository>

<!--Â HeadDatabase-APIÂ -->
<dependency>
Â  Â <groupId>me.arcaniax</groupId>
Â  Â <artifactId>HeadDatabase-API</artifactId>
Â  Â <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>

mc.buildersrefuge.com – MC Version: 1.12
/public > /plot auto /hdbâ€‹

Head DatabaseÂ is useful for and is used by many build teams! You may know some of them, such as…


â€‹

â€‹


Please DO NOT use reviews for errors or support.
If you find something that is broken,Â contacting me through DiscordÂ will be a lot faster.
